英文公告.機關地址: No.131, Changxing St., Da-an District, Taipei City 106, Taiwan (R.O.C.)
英文公告.標案名稱: A planning and metering work for district meter areas
英文公告.附加說明: 1.To plan several district meter areas (DMA) from the appointed block in the water network.2.To be aimed at the boundary of assigned DMA and follow these works as below:(1)The survey and pinpoint works for distribution pipes fire hydrants and valves with the diameter of water mains ranging from 75 mm to 500 mm.(2)The survey and pinpoint works for unknown distribution pipes.(3)The detecting and unearthing works for the buried fire hydrants and valves.(4)The re-plotting works when the positions of fire hydrants or valves are inaccurate on GIS. 3.Before the Confirming Operation for suspending water supply the interior and exterior pressures of assigned DMA must be measured for six hours.4.Only with zero pressure of six interior fire hydrants at least it is proven to pass the Confirming Operation of DMA in situ setup.5.To recommend the suitable location for flow meter installation after pressure analysis of assigned DMA proving no risk of water shortage.6.By using Ground Penetrating Radar to help locating the accurate position when flow-meter is being assembled on site.7.To measure and analysis the ratio of accounted-for water Direct Minimum Flow or Minimum Nighttime Flow for assigned DMA.
